FuncDef: The expand application volume size command expands the storage space of an application. The expand application volume size command expands the storage space of an application.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the target storage space of the application.
The value is a 64-bit unsigned integer.

Specifies the name of an application.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: Warning: The specified application will be restarted in expand progress.Continue? [Y/N]:y
